name: Light Surfer
description:
Surfing Light Beams in Space. How cool is that? You cannot die, just avoid the asteroids until the end. You lose "Awesomeness" when you collide with them. The higher the Awesomeness, the higher the difficulty (the asteroids get angry and come at you faster and in greater numbers) WARNING: We used Comic Sans, deal with it.

Jam Site: GranadaJam
